Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Score Description
1 Own Tempo 4 This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
1 Ice Body 4 The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.
18 Snow Cloak 6 Boosts evasiveness in a hailstorm.
36 Sleet Spit 5 The Pokémon generates a hailstorm when it's hit by an attack.
54 Frozen Body 6 Contact with the Pokémon may cause frostbite.
72 Steam Engine 3 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat drastically if hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.
90 Snow Warning 9 The Pokémon summons a hailstorm when it enters a battle.
100 Unaware 7 When attacking, the Pokémon ignores the target Pokémon's stat changes.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Score Description
Disc 01 Battle Armor 2 Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
Disc 10 Water Veil 4 The Pokémon is covered with a water veil, which prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.
Disc 27 Snow Warning 9 The Pokémon summons a hailstorm when it enters a battle.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Score Description
Calderize 8 Normal-type moves become Fire-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Heatproof 6 The heatproof body of the Pokémon halves the damage from Fire-type moves that hit it.
High Entropy 5 Boosts the Pokémon's Evasiveness under Gravity.
High-Pressured 4 The Pokémon generates a heat wave when it's hit by an attack.
Huge Power 15 Doubles the Pokémon's Attack stat.
Humidity Rush 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a heat wave.
Neutralizing Gas 10 When in the battle, the effects of all Pokémon's Abilities will be nullified.
Stagnant Air 9 The Pokémon generates a heat wave when it enters battle.
Steam Engine 3 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat drastically if hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.
Thermal Exchange 6 Boosts the Attack stat when hit by a Fire-type move. The Pokémon also cannot be burned.
Volatile 7 Boosts the Special Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
